鶹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liú］
［《廣韻》力求切，平尤，來。］
“鹠1”的繁体字。
(1)鸺鶹。
(2)见“鶹鷅”。

鶹字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鶹； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1496第29
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?力求切，音劉。【玉篇】鶹鷅鳥。又名鶹離。【爾雅·釋鳥】鳥少美長醜爲鶹鷅。【註】一作留離。【詩·邶風】瑣兮尾兮，流離之子。【陸璣疏】自關而西，謂梟爲流離。亦作留離。又鵂鶹，怪鳥。一曰鴞。一名鵋䳢。

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鹠; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1496 29
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Strive to cut, sound Liu. [Jade articles] Buzzard bird. Also known as Yuli. 【Erya·Shu Niao】The beautiful and ugly bird is the birdie. [Note] One for leave. [Poetry·Bei Feng] Trivial and simple, the child of the drifting. 【Lu Jishu】From Guanxi to the west, it is said that Xiao Xiao is displaced. Also leave. Owl, strange bird. One said the owl. A 鵋䳢.
